content: f p2 f p1 b p2 a p3 e p1 b p5 e p1 b p2 f p7 g p2 i p2 h k4 h row 21 k7 h k3 i k5 g k2 f k1 b k5 e k1 b k3 e k2 a k1 b k6 f finished with color g row 22 k4 f p2 f p1 b p1 a p4 e p1 b p5 e p1 b p2 f p6 i p5 h k4 h finished with color a row 23 k10 h k5 i k2 f k1 b k5 e k1 b k5 e k1 b k6 f row 24 k4 f p2 f p1 b p5 e p1 b p5 e p1 b p2 f p4 i p2 j p5 h k4 h finished with color e please note that the knitted square in this photo has not been blocked yet row 25 k7 h k5 j k3 i k2 f k13 b k6 f finished with colors h and i row 26 k4 f p17 f p2 i p7 j p2 h k4 h finished with color f row 27 k14 j k22 b row 28 k4 b p17 b p11 j k4 j row 29 k16 j k20 b row 30 k4 b p15 b p13 j k4 j finished with color b row 31 k36 j row 32 k4 j p28 j k4 j row 33-36 k36 j bind off weave in ends and block knitting chart chart notes to create a border row 1-4 and 33-36 will be a garter stitch this is also true for the first 4 stitches of row 5 through 32 this is indicated by the white outline on the chart for the middle section row 5-32 you will alternate between the right side and the wrong side the right side the odd row will be made up of knit stiches the wrong side the even row will be made up of purl stitches to read the chart start an odd row from the right side of the chart and start an even row from the left side of the chart happy knitting please note that the chart on next page knitted square in this photo has not been blocked yet i hope you enjoyed creating this pattern for more pattern inspiration as well as reading and tea recommendations visit us at novel tea knits on instagram ó 2025 novel tea knits all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only and may not be used to produce items for resale if you have any questions about this pattern please contact me at novelteaknits kb@gmail com
